string.text: Procure %s
A fellow stalker asked me to bring him %s.
I'm running low on supplies. If you happen to have any on-hand or are willing to bring me some, I would be very grateful.
I'm low on %s. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Great, man! Thanks!
Procure %s
I was asked to find %s, by a fellow stalker.
Shit, man. Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on my supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %s. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Awesome, man. Thanks!
Procure %s
A stalker has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving, but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s, I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you, stalker. Here is your payment. Oh, and here: I have some ammo that doesn't fit my rifle. You can have it.
Find the %s artefact
A fellow stalker is offering a reward in exchange for a %s artefact.
Are you any good at artefact hunting?
If you happen to find a %s, let me know. I can't afford to pay you but I have a very nice rifle I think you will like.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been searching for this. Here, this is my finest rifle. I hate to part with it but it is well worth it to me.
You need to find the artifact %s
Stalker offers a weapon in return for the artifact of %s.
Artifact can you find? To me. that is, our group needs this artifact! We must transfer it to scientists, this will help them in developing protective devices.

Do you hunt for artifacts in general? Artifact can you find? To me. that is, our group needs this artifact! We must transfer it to scientists, this will help them in developing protective devices. cannot you? If you can find the artifact %s, let me know. I cannot pay, but I have a very good weapon, I think you'll like it.
At last! You do not know how long I've been looking for him. Here, my best weapon. I do not want to part with him, but it's worth it.
You need to find the artifact %s
Monoliths ask you to find an artifact %s.
Artifact can you find? I want to leave it as a gift to our Monolith in Sarcophagus.
If you can find the artifact %s, let me know.
Thank you brother, you really helped me.
Find %s
A stalker needs a %s in perfect condition.
Yeah, my stash was looted, and I lost my favourite rifle. Can you help me find a new one?
I'm looking for a %s. I loved that rifle. If you can find me one in good condition, I'll pay you a premium for it.
Thank you, stalker! Here is what I owe you. Now, off to hunt that damn fracture...
Find weapons: %s
the scientist needs a weapon: %s, in excellent condition.
Young man, could you help get me a gun? And then we were given no idea what, even from the tuskans it's difficult to fight back, I'll be indebted to you!
I'm looking for %s. With such weapons, it's much safer for me and my group, I'm counting on you.
Thank you, now with such a trunk is much safer to conduct field research.
Find "%s"
Procure a reliable %s.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Reverse bounty hunt
A stalker needs a bounty taken off his head.
Yes, help me, brother! Some bastard has put a price on my head. Take care of him for me, and I will pay you double the bounty he has on me.
Oh, thank you, stalker! Here's your payment. I can finally sleep for the first time in days!
Revenge killing
A stalker wants me to avenge the death of his comrade.

A bandit snuck into our camp last night and murdered my friend in cold blood. We can't let this kind of scum keep breathing. Kill him for me, stalker. In return, I'll give you my slain comrade's rifle.
Thank you stalker, you are a good warrior. Join me in a drink to my fallen brother.
Procure %s
Find %s for a bandit.
You wanna to swap some loot?
I've got some good shit I can give you if you can find me some %s.
Great man, thanks!
Procure %s
Find %s for a soldier.
You have any supplies you want to trade?
Tell you what: I'll trade you some extra ammo I've got if you can get me some %s.
Great man, thanks!
Find the %s artefact
A soldier is offering a rifle in exchange for the %s artefact.
Hey, listen, man. I know this is against regulations, but I'm going to be rotating home soon, and I want to bring back a souvenir. You think you can find an artefact for me?
I want to get a %s. If you can find me one I'll give you my rifle.
Awesome! Here's what I promised you. Don't let the commander know I have this.
Straw purchase
A bandit needs an untraceable %s, no questions asked.
Listen, I need a rifle that can't be traced back to me. You know what I mean? You willing to help me out with this?
I need a %s. Buy it, steal it, loot it, whatever you gotta do; just get me one. I'll pay you double what it's worth.
Great! Here's what I promised you. And you never met me, got it?
Glory kill
A fellow soldier has bet his rifle that I can't assassinate a high-value target.

What, are you trying to climb the ranks or something? Tell you what hotshot, I happen to know the location of a certain high-value target the brass wants eliminated. I'll bet you my rifle you can't even get close to him.

For real? You really did it? Damn, if I though you had any chance I never would have made this bet. Well, a deal's a deal. Here's my rifle. But you better be covering my ass with it in the next firefight.
Subcontractor
You have taken over a contract killing.
I do, actually. I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Great job. Here's the money I owe you.
Wh-Who are you? Are you here to help me, stalker?
Come with me if you want to live!
Special order: Collect the goods
The goods have been delivered - time to collect them from Nimble.
Special order: Wait for delivery
The order has been made, so now you should wait for Nimble to get the goods.
Attention! Emission imminent!
Emission imminent, proceed to shelter immediately!
You are not allowed to leave the shelter during an emission.
Emission: Find shelter
Emission: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout begins.
The level of radiation is dangerous. You should hide from the radioactive fallout.
You shouldn't leave the shelter during the radioactive fallout.
Radioactive fallout: Find shelter
Radioactive fallout: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout has ended
Attention!
Chemical fallout begins.
The level of contamination is dangerous. You should hide from the chemical fallout.
You shouldn't leave the shelter during the chemical fallout.
Chemical fallout: Find shelter
Chemical fallout: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Chemical fallout has ended
Rescue operation
It is necessary to find and save the soldier who was captured.

Karoche, this is the case. Some of the bastards were taken prisoner by my friend while he was on patrol, we are in the same platoon, one I cannot get him out, and the commander of a bitch, refused to send a rescue team, they say, there are not enough people and means, will you help? It will not rust for me, but only pull it out!
Nifiga to yourself, did you manage?! Thank you! I never thought of seeing him alive. Hold the reward, deserved:
Rescuing the Bandit
It is necessary to find and save the captured bandit.

Karoche, this is the case. Some pedrils grabbed one of our boys, he's like a mother to me, how did you understand your brother? I do not think that he will last long at the stalker, so you need to get him out quickly, will you help the little brother?
Oban, did you manage to escape?! Thank you! I never thought of seeing him alive. Hold the obshchak, deserve:
Rescue operation
It is necessary to find and save the captive Chistonebovtsa.

Karoche, this is the case. What kind of bastards have captured my friend, while he was conducting research on the Moor, one I cannot pull it out, will you help? It will not rust for me, but only pull it out!
Nifiga to yourself, did you manage?! Thank you! I never thought of seeing him alive. Hold the reward, deserved:
Rescue operation
It is necessary to find and save the captive monolith.

Brother, I think you can help me, one of our wounded, cruelly beaten and captured infidels! I followed them and I know where they keep our brother, but I cannot get him out alone, help me! the data of his location if I throw off on your PDA
Thank you, our brother is back in service at the Great Monolith, you deserve a reward for brave help!
Kill the wrong person
It is necessary to find and eliminate the wrong.
There is one unfaithful who caused a lot of evil and profanes by the existence of the Great Monolith, one must find and destroy the infidel.
Another infidel has become less, keep the reward.
Destroy the enemy
Destroy the enemy at the key point
We need to help get the enemy out of our captured territory, will you help?
Point for us, keep the reward:
Destroy the enemy
Destroy the enemy at the key point
the infidels have captured one of our strongholds in the region, you need to beat them, will you help brother?
the point is behind us, the infidels have fallen, keep the reward:
Destroy the enemy
Destroy the enemy at the key point
We need to knock out some roosters from our territory, will you help the bro? There if Che on the arrow podtsanyutsya, do not ssy!
Our point is the euphies! Hammer brother, keep the reward:
Listen to the peasant, your help is needed, we need to fight off one of our former camps from the freaks of some, podsobish?
Thank's man! True, no words, keep the reward:
Karoche, the enemy captured the key object in this territory, you have to go and beat him fuck, will you help?
Great, here's the reward.
Listen man needs your help, we need to fight off one of our former camps from the freaks of one, will you help the dude?
Dude, you give! He took all and decided, we did not leave anything, cool, steep, Christmas trees-sticks! Hey, where are you going? Take the reward for a good deed.
Destroy the mutant's lair
It is necessary to secure the nearest allied camps from mutants.

Yes, help is needed, in truth, here the monsters fuckers have settled inappropriately and attack our detachments, it is only for the camp to get out, will you be able to find their lair and shoot all the fuck?
Thank you for figuring out the monsters, hold on, here a little, but that's all I had.
Find %s
Obtain a sample of mutant tissue: %s.
I need some parts of the monsters here, can you?
I need parts of the monsters, this is my business, so I do not need to explain, I'm looking. %s. How to find me.
Thank you, here's the reward, you really helped me bro.
Attention!
Psi-storm begins.
You should hide from the psi-storm.
You shouldn't leave shelter during a psi-storm.
Psi-storm: Find shelter
Psi-storm: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Psi-storm has ended
Defend the base against mutants
Defend the Ecologist camp against zombified stalkers
Mutants are attacking the base. Help defend it!
Zombified stalkers are attacking the mobile lab, help defend it! The weak blowout which just started doesn't affect you. Search for and use the deployable machine gun on the roof of the mobile lab.
Death of 'Duty'
Freedom asked to avenge the death of a friend, who was killed by a dolgovetz.

I need your help, one rotten debtor killed my friend when he went to the raid, I even know where this bitch is, but I just cannot kill the whole camp he is in, I see you are a grated dude, and you can handle it with such a task, so how can you help? I will be very must.
A friend is now avenged, thank you man, here we receive from a pure heart:
Find %s
To get cartridges for the commander of the 'Freedom' unit %s.
Listen to the Maine, help pliz, we have territorial fights here, and the cartridges of the detachment are running out! Can you get us ammo? In debt will not stay!
Excellent. I'm looking for %s. This is enough to provide my squad with the necessary amount of ammunition!
Thanks dude! He just won us out, here take a reward from us, as a token of gratitude!
Search and rescue
A stalker's buddy was kidnapped by a gang of bandits. He asked me to try and rescue him.
I could really use some help, man. My friend was mugged and taken hostage by some bandits. I really don't know what I should do. Do you think you can help me out and save my friend?
You did it! Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my friend back and alive! Here - for your trouble:
Search and rescue
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Duty who is being held hostage.
Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken hostage! I'm in desperate need of someone capable enough to stage a rescue operation. Do you think you can help us out and save our friend?
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see you saved our fellow comrade! Here - for your trouble:
Search and rescue
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Freedom who is being held hostage.
Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken hostage! I'm in desperate need of someone capable enough to stage a rescue operation. Do you think you can help us out and save our friend?
You did it! Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my friend back and alive! Here - for your trouble:
Search and rescue
Rescue an ecologist from a group of bandits.
Yes, please help! One of my colleagues was kidnapped. Can you help rescue him?
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my colleague back! Please accept this as a reward.
